name: foodle-recipes
title: Foodle Recipes
description: Search for recipes by name or ingredient
author: skroll

commands.name: recipe-for
commands.title: Recipe For
commands.subtitle: Foodle Recipes
commands.description: Search recipes by name via recipe search engine foodle.recipes

commands.name: recipe-with
commands.title: Recipe With
commands.subtitle: Foodle Recipes
commands.description: Search recipes by ingredients via recipe search engine foodle.recipes

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
